name: Eraser (SnappyPath, cleerax)
description:
PLOT

You are the eraser of a student who is passing an exam.

The owner made some mistakes, you need to erase them to get the highest score.

But erasing makes you smaller, because you are an eraser. You have to fulfill your duty as an eraser and sacrifice yourself for the sake of the owner!

CONTROLS:

Press AD or ArrowKeys to move.

Press Space or W or ArrowUp to jump.

Press Shift to erase.
